data.text:
This is the list of songs for Magic 89.9's Throwback Library, the library used by Friday Madness (1980-1999), and Saturday Stepback (2000-2016), also heard on sister station 99.5 Play FM every Thursday as Playback (2000-2016). Also on rival Riot Wednesday on Monster RX 93.1 (2000-2019) and Weekend Recovery Radio on 87.5 Republika FM1 (2010-2016).

Friday Madness[]

Magic 89.9's very own Friday Madness, the mother of all throwback that plays and combines the two best decades: the 80's music from the same original Friday Madness and the 90's music from the station's defunct all-90s program Saturday Slam; all in one Friday madness.
